mapper.select: select users,time_ms,individual_sync,individual_distance,individual_rate from individual_sync_a where meeting_id = #{param1} order by time_ms,users
select distinct time_ms from individual_sync_a where meeting_id = #{param1} order by time_ms
select distinct users from individual_sync_a where meeting_id = #{param1} order by users
select time_ms,individual_sync,individual_distance,individual_rate from individual_sync_a where meeting_id = #{param1} and users = #{param2} order by time_ms
